Package it.unicas.clinic.address.model.dao.mysql

Class AppointmentDAOMySQLImpl

java.lang.Object
it.unicas.clinic.address.model.dao.mysql.AppointmentDAOMySQLImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDAO<Appointment>
public class AppointmentDAOMySQLImpl extends Object implements AppointmentDAO<Appointment>
Contains the implementation of the interaction between application and database for Appointment table.

    • softDelete

      public void softDelete(int s) throws AppointmentException
      Set the cancellation field TRUE inside the database. Thanks to the cancellation field the app can't see the appointments subject to soft deletion.
      Specified by:
      softDelete in interface AppointmentDAO<Appointment>
      Parameters:
      s - : appointment to be "deleted"
      Throws:
      AppointmentException

    • select

      public List<Appointment> select(Appointment s, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws AppointmentException
      Returns a List of Appointments similar to the one passed by arguments. The two LocalDate variables sets the time window in which the search is executed.
      Specified by:
